text.section:
Except as provided in subsection (c) of this section, an individual, including a migrant farm worker, is a covered employee if:
the individual receives compensation from a farmer for any service other than office work, including:
operating a machine connected with animal, crop, or soil management;
constructing or repairing a fixture or machine; or
handling an animal or crop with or without a machine; and
the farmer has:
at least 3 full-time employees; or
an annual payroll of at least $15,000 for full-time employees.
